calculations.name: title date
calculations.tableau_expression: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [Max Date] ELSE  [Parameters].[End Date] END

calculation_context.Expression: if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] THEN [Max Date] ELSE  [Parameters].[End Date] END

calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
